IQs: Which channels do users use to communicate feature requests (e.g., discussion forums or issue trackers)?
How easy is it to navigate through the channels?
What information do you include in your feature request?
After submitting a feature request, how do you usually check whether it has been acted upon?
Who transfers the user requests from channel to a developer?
Have you ever received any clarification questions or feedback on your request from developers, maintainers, or other users?
Where do developers communicate with you for clarification if any?
How responsive do you feel developers or maintainers are to user requests?
What would make it easier or more effective for you to propose a feature request?
Interview3: Better acknowledgment + Direct submission + Better navigation
Interview4: Better forum + Better onboarding for non-technical users
